thread.section_title: Humura Resorts - UPDATED 2017 Resort Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Little oasis
thread.title_full: Little oasis - Review of Humura Resorts, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: KT-Seels
title: Little oasis
text:
After 10 years of visiting Kampala, my favorite hotel in Kampala changed management so I started looking for a new favorite.
Humura is it.
Quiet and charming, this elegant place is like a little oasis in the middle of Kampala. The rooms are stunning, clean, and well-appointed. The garden is small but peaceful. The staff is considerate. Raymond Odima was an attentive manager; he was a wonderful communicator over email and also quite flexible in helping me host a last-minute meeting in their conference room.
I definitely look forward to staying at Humura when I am back in Kampala. It's a relatively unknown boutique hotel I did not expect to find. Am so glad I did.
